content: @Simon Hudon Thanks for commenting on the PR. Except... I don't really understand your comment. Would you please explain?

Sure. In bifunctor, I have two composition functions for binary functions. Yours corresponds to one of them. You could move the functions from category.bifunctor to logic.function, generalize their types and have a similar definition to what I have. What I'd like to avoid is having two sets of identical definitions with their own sets of lemmas.
Aha! Ok, I guess we could do that.
I'll look at it as soon as I have some Lean-time again (-;
Why is your head upside down, btw?
Because all sorts of programs automatically substitute an emoji for your head, if you are not careful. I like to deliberately decide when to use an emoji, and when to have an ascii-art head.
And "all sorts of programs" so far haven't figure out my trick (-;
I am aware of the fact that Zulip is not part of "all sorts of programs"
